headline: Three Reasons Why ODFL is Risky and One Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Old Dominion Freight Line has been treading water for the past six months, recording a small return of 4.5% while holding steady at $184. This is close to the S&P 500’s 9.2% gain during that period.
